split1.prompt: Create a 1x2 sprite sheet of the child in the reference image, pixar cartoon style avatars, each sprite cleanly fitting inside the grid. Left: [Standing, holding up a teddy bear, joyous smile, wearing sky-blue dungarees over sunshine-yellow T-shirt, tan sandals, Eye level full body, Bright studio lighting.] Right: [Sitting, hands on cheeks, mouth surprised "O", legs folded, toes curled, in moon-print PJs, full body, bright morning light.] Transparent background. No shadows or other objects visible in the frame.
